_sText:
This choppah was made by djflyer. You can find the original download link on this german site:
http://www.mapping-tutorials.de/forum/showthread.php?t=5697
It´s a tutorial about how to make such flyable choppahs. (in german)
When i return i´m going to make a english tutorial about it. (if i find some time)
_______________________________________________________________________
Changes:
I parented the buttons on the choppah.
Added a trigger hurt.
Changed the name of the entities. (so everyone can understand it)
Added a nice effect that has nothing to do with the choppah.^^
_______________________________________________________________________
I can´t edit/change the choppah atm because i removed steam from my pc. A friend of mine tested the prefab today and it worked fine for him.
So have fun and don´t forget to credit djflyer! =]
____________________________________________________________________
Control:
Don´t use the left mouse button to get up, use the buttons for that.
I guess you will understand how the choppah works after some practice.^^
____________________________________________________________________
P.S. I´m away for 2-4 weeks if there is any problem please pm me or drop a message on my profile before you take any actions. Thanks for your time.
